issue.title: Some Google's domains used for ads/tracking to be blocked (Missed ads/tracking)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Public Plain DNS (Default servers)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, other (specify in comment below), the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites and apps

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Here are some Google's domains used for serving ads or for tracking that aren't currently blocked by AdGuard Public DNS: Some of them seem to only be contacted by mobile apps.

```
analytics-api-samples.googlecode.com
video-stats.video.google.com
www.googleadservices.com
domains.googlesyndication.com
www.googletagservices.com
ads.google.com
afs.googlesyndication.com
mobileads.google.com
video-ad-stats.googlesyndication.com
adservice.google.com
googletagmanager.com
www.googletagmanager.com
mobileads.google.com
mail-ads.google.com
pagead.l.doubleclick.net
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.51.1b1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://connatix.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I found possible trackers loaded when you visit the site directly.

comment.body: @GreenObsidian1 Hello. Checked the site with AdGuard Base, AdGuard Mobile Ads, AdGuard Annoyances, AdGuard Social Media filters - could not reproduce the popup. Could you please, disable all third party filters and leave only the necessary ones and then check the page again. In AdGuard for iOS, it is not recommended to enable a large number of filters.

```
51chegg.cn##.bottom
51chegg.cn##.mpQrcode
```

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

comment.body:
Не повторяется, реклама блокируется с нашей стороны.

> После обновления адгуард до версии 4 , начала появляться реклама недвижимости и всякой хрени

Проверьте какой сертификат использует браузер. Если не наш, то его нужно будет [переустановить](https://adguard.com/kb/ru/adguard-for-android/overview/#https-filtering).

> Нажимаю обновить фильтр блокировки контакта- не обновляется

Свяжитесь с support@adguard.com - вам попробуют помочь.

Unfortunately, not reproduced it on my end, but I've removed some other subscriptions.
If you still get it, please provide steps to reproduce. You can also send the code of the element here using the developer tools.
To do it:
1. Press right click on the element
2. Select `inspect the code`
3. Make a screenshot, then send it here.

comment.body:
К сожалению, мы не можем воспроизвести проблему с вашими настройками.

1. Зайдите, пожалуйста, в настройки > Safari > расширения, отключите все расширения AdGuard и включите снова.
2. Зайдите в приложение AdGuard и обновите фильтры, подождите 2-3 минуты не закрывая приложение.
3. Перезагрузите устройство
4. Зайдите на этот сайт и проверьте наличие рекламы, ее быть не должно.

Если реклама останется, обратитесь в нашу поддержку support@adguard.com

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy). The website has low visitors. Please add these rules to the User Rules:
```
hercs-adventures.fandom.com#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'ac-floated-player', '.ac-player-wrapper')
hercs-adventures.fandom.com##.top-ads-container
hercs-adventures.fandom.com##.bottom-ads-container
```

Как отключить панель Советника на всех сайтах:

В разделе Покупки найдите расширение Советник и отключите его.

comment.body:
Found a solution to the problem. It works The first two lines are maybe not needed but the third line is a must. I think it uses the help of google ads to detect adguard. I don't know much but it works. Add these lines to user rules section. The first line is for cookies:
`@@||rewayatcafe.com^$cookie=pvc_visits[0]
@@||googlesyndication.com^$domain=ar.rewayatcafe.com`
Please link commits to comments if you remove/changes rules.
@Alex-302 We already have `goo.ne.jp,ocn.ne.jp##div[id^="gooad"]`
